Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: No individual is outside the circumference of your ravishing locks of hair,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਤੇਰੇ ਮੁਖੜੇ ਦੇ ਸਾ੍ਹਮਨੇ ਚੰਨ ਵੀ ਸ਼ਰਮਿੰਦਾ ਹੈ ।

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, my enchanted mind is also twirled into the same mania. (13) (2)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਨਹੀਣ, ਸਗੋਣ ਜਹਾਨ ਦਾ ਸੂਰਜ ਵੀ ਤੇਰਾ ਗੁਲਾਮ ਹੈ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: cSim mw hrigz bgYr Az h¤k nw dId [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Since the time his beautiful tall and hefty torso has penetrated into my eyes,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਸਾਡੀ ਅੱਖ ਨੇ ਸਿਵਾਇ ਰੱਬ ਦੇ ਕਿਸੇ ਨੂੰ ਨਹੀਣ ਵੇਖਿਆ ।

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: I have not been able to recognize any one else except his living-cypress-like graceful personality. (13) (3)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਵਾਹ# ਕਿੰਨੀ ਸੁਭਾਗੀ ਹੈ ਉਹ ਅੱਖ ਜਿਹੜੀ ਕਿ ਰੱਬ ਨੂੰ ਵੇਖਣ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੈ ।

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Just hearing the ringing of the bell hung in the neck of Laila's camel, my heart went crazy (because it was the sign of Laila's arrival),

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਅਸੀਣ ਕਦੀ ਆਪਣੀ ਭਗਤੀ ਅਤੇ ਪਾਖੰਡ ਦੀ ਡੀਣਗ ਨਹੀ ਮਾਰਦੇ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: gr gunwh Zwrym h¤k b^iSMdw Asq [9[3[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, like Majnoo, it became ecstatic and ran towards the wilderness of the jungle. (13) (4)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਜੇਕਰ ਅਸੀ ਗੁਨਹਿਗਾਰ ਹਾਣ ਤਾਣ ਰੱਬ ਬਖਸ਼ਨਹਾਰ ਹੈ ।

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Ever since, his love-story has abided in my heart,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਕਿਸੇ ਦੂਜੇ ਨੂੰ ਅਸੀਣ ਹੋਰ ਕਿੱਥੋਣ ਲਿਆਈਏ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: Sor dr Awlm Xky A&gMdw Asq [9[4[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: I have no taste for anything other than his true remembrance in every fiber of my body. (13) (5)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਇੱਕ ਦਾ ਹੀ ਇਸ ਦੁਨੀਆ ੁਿਵਚ ਬਥੇਰਾ ਰੌਲਾ ਪਿਆ ਹੋਇਆ ਹੈ ।

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: My diamond-showering eyes are preserving lustrous gems similar to the delicate poppy flowers,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਰੱਬ ਤੋ ਬਿਨਾਣ ਦੂਜਾ ਹਰਫ ਕਦੀ ਵੀ ਗੋਯਾ ਦੇ ਬੁੱਲਾਣ ਤੇ ਨਹੀਣ ਆਉਣਦਾ,

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation:
So that during your momentary visit, I could waive them over your precious head in sacrifice." (13) (6)
Today, my life is ending through both of my eyes,
However, the chance of only one glimpse of him has been deferred to the doomsday.” (13) (7) 
Nothing else but the praises of the Lord come up on my lips,
Ultimately, Goyaa's heart has reaped full benefits of this life." (13) (8)
